title: Delhi hotels far from being able to benefit from rising big-ticket events business
description: Ayush Dabas, owner of Welcomhotel by ITC Hotels in Dwarka, Delhi, is eager to expand his property's facilities to meet the increasing demand for MICE events. However, existing norms make it unfeasible for hotels to increase their floor area ratio (FAR) due to restrictions on parking and ground coverage. This limitation, coupled with high FAR rates for hotels compared to commercial establishments, has hindered the growth of hotel supply in Delhi.
